pageContext.claim: “Mary Trump, a seldom seen niece who knows little about me, says untruthful things about my wonderful parents (who couldn’t stand her!) and me, and violated her NDA. She also broke the Law by givng out my.... ....Tax Returns.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump's niece is the author of "Too Much and Never Enough," which paints the president as a psychologically-afflicted danger to the republic. She says she is not bound by the nondisclosure agreement Trump referenced because Trump and his siblings falsely undervalued the estate of Fred Trump Sr., her grandfather, as part of the same legal proceedings at issue.
